data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, Niel L., Brix, Saskia, Balfour, Nicholas, Kihara, Terue C., Weigand, Alexander M., Mehterian, Sevag, Iliffe, Thomas M. (2017): A new genus for Cirolanatroglexuma Botosaneanu & Iliffe, 1997, an anchialine cave dwelling cirolanid isopod (Crustacea, Isopoda, Cirolanidae) from the Bahamas. Subterranean Biology 21: 57-92, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.21.11181, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.21.11181
